requestBody.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "First-time setup flow completion time". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

requestBody.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Pause/cancel lifecycle and grace windows". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
data.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).
